//comment test
//func int test
func int add(int a,int b) 
        return a + b
end

//comment test
//multiple func test
func int sub(int c, int d)
        return c - d
end

//void func test
func println(string word)
        print(word + "\n")
end
//func overloading test
func println(int word)
        print(word + "\n")
end

//func string test
func string strcat(string pre, string suf)
        return pre + suf
end
